p.n: Sam Churchill: Search For A Homeless Man
p.k: Thriller about an ex-surfer turned detective (The Dukes Of Hazzard's John Schneider) who tracks a hostage held by a dangerous gang
70% Assassin Timothy Olyphant is caught up in a deadly conspiracy when a hit goes wrong and he's stuck with a Russian callgirl
73% Gritty prison thriller starring Nikolaj Coster-Waldau (Game of Thrones) as a family man drawn into an unfamiliar criminal underworld following a fatal road accident
79% Robert De Niro stars as mob boss Al Capone, with Kevin Costner as the Treasury agent determined to take him down. Gangland thriller
71% Tom Cruise stars as a frustrated airline pilot who gets mixed up with both the CIA and drug kingpin Pablo Escobar. From Edge of Tomorrow's Doug Liman
To save his brother from gangsters, legendary auto thief Nicolas Cage must steal 50 classic cars in one night. Action co-starring Angelina Jolie
65% Former smuggler Mark Wahlberg is forced back for one last run when his brother-in-law lets down unhinged crime boss Giovanni Ribisi
Blind pianist Natalie Dormer (who also co-writes) is drawn into a brutal criminal underworld after she overhears an attack on her neighbour. Thriller with Ed Skrein
61% Sci-fi thriller starring Jodie Foster as the operator of a secret, criminals-only safe house in a dystopian, near-future LA. With Jeff Goldblum and Dave Bautista
79% Robert De Niro stars as mob boss Al Capone, with Kevin Costner as the Treasury agent determined to take him down. Gangland thriller
British crime thriller starring Craig Fairbrass as a ruthless Essex gangster plotting revenge on the drug baron who betrayed him and left him in prison. With Larry Lamb
When a teacher with a simple life moves to London, an exciting fresh start becomes a hellish, drug-fuelled nightmare when the city life awakens his dark impulses
